metadata.title: RIAH FASHION Gemstone Crystal Perfume Bottle Diffuser Necklace - Aromatherapy Essential Oil Travel Locket Pendant Charm Fragrance Carrier Flask Chain
features: ✦RIAH FASHION✦ We offer high quality, stylish fashion jewelry & accessories at a very affordable price point. Designed by our talented team in the USA, our lovely jewelry is a fashion must-have. Discover unique, well-made jewelry & accessories at RIAH Fashion.

✦STYLE MADE SIMPLE✦ Find both classic staples & trendy items from RIAH collection. Wear our fashion statment pieces to a holiday party, prom, date night, or any special occasion and shine! Pair with your favorite cocktail dress for a fabulous look or with your everyday casual for effortless chic style.

✦GREAT VALUE✦ Enjoy high-end quality, gorgeous jewelry at a low price point. All our beautiful jewelry is Lead & Nickel compliant with all U.S. requirements, lovingly packaged and delivered state-wide.

✦PERFECT GIFT IDEA✦ Comes with an elegant jewelry gift box, perfect for any gift giving occasion. Shop great gifts for girlfriend, wife, sister, daughter, mom, bridesmaid, and friends for graduation, birthday, Mother's Day, Christmas, Valentines Day, wedding anniversary, etc. Treat yourself or someone special to this stunning jewelry!

✦PRODUCT DETAILS✦ This stylish long-line necklace showcases a natural stone cut perfume bottle, perfect to enjoy your favorite essential oil or perfume at hand. Its easy to use function makes it hassle free - just twist bottle and dispense with syringe that's included. MATERIAL: Base Metal, Natural Stone. MEASUREMENT: 26" Length. ♥CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Limit exposure to water, perfume or body cream to extend the life of your jewelry.♥
description: This stylish long-line necklace showcases a natural stone cut perfume bottle, perfect to enjoy your favorite essential oil or perfume at hand. Its easy to use function makes it hassle free - just twist bottle and dispense with syringe that's included. You can wear these as pretty necklaces dressed up or down, any occasion goes. These also make perfect gifts for any women!

title: Perfume Bottle Necklace
